description: You can store a payment card on your account to speed up making any future payments.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You can store a payment card on your account to speed up making any future payments."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Or, if you want to make automatic payments for the Congestion Charge and/or ULEZ charges, you can set up Auto Pay.
You can set up this service once you have created your account.
